text: kindness costs nothing once upon a time

as for the mahute well he became best
friends with Harry the Potter and
together they sold pots the mahute would
deliver pots in the shape of elephants
to people all around the village and
spread the message that animals are to
be loved and it is not good to be cruel
to them what we learn from this story is
that animals are best at their natural
habitats and if we really want to help
them all we have to do is be kind for
kindness costs nothing and yet it's
worth is immeasurable
